articles.title: Boston man facing animal cruelty charges for whipping, dragging dog, claims he was pet-sitting
articles.description:
The man told law enforcement that he was pet-sitting the dog and was trying to train it, and further alleged that the dog bit him.

The post Boston man facing animal cruelty charges for whipping, dragging dog, claims he was pet-sitting appeared first on Boston.com.
